arts.ttl: Simeone discusses title chances after defeat to Barcelona ends tragic week
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid coach Diego Simeone spoke to the press following the painful and dramatic 4-2 defeat to FC Barcelona in La Liga on Sunday night on a number of topics, but refused to rule his team out of the title race. “We didn’t defend well that kick-off in the middle to be strong and Lewandowski scored a great goal.

arts.ttl: La Liga Title Race: Barcelona, Real Madrid, Atletico Madrid Next Five Games After Matchweek 28
arts.sum: Barcelona and Real Madrid are four points clear of Atlético Madrid with 10 matchweeks to go in the La Liga title race.

arts.ttl: Takeaways: Atlético’s week from hell ends with a Barcelona rally at the Metropolitano
arts.sum: Goals from Julián Alvarez and Alexander Sørloth had the red and white side of Madrid bouncing, but Barça hit back instantaneously through Robert Lewandowski, Ferrán Torres and a horribly-deflected Lamine Yamal shot. The last 19 days have seen Atlético play Real Madrid twice, Barcelona twice, Athletic Club and Getafe CF across three different competitions.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid 2-4 Barcelona: Stunning comeback sends Blaugrana top of La Liga
arts.sum: Barca return to the top of LaLiga despite trailing 2-0 with 20 minutes to play

arts.ttl: Antoine Griezmann equals all-time Lionel Messi La Liga record
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid star Antoine Griezmann has on Sunday evening secured for himself a fresh piece of Spanish football history. This comes owing to his appearance in the club’s latest outing.…

arts.ttl: Watch: Atlético fans spit on and vandalise Thibaut Courtois plaque ahead of Barcelona clash
arts.sum: Sections of the Atlético Madrid fanbase on Sunday evening made use of the opportunity to make clear their disgust with former Rojiblancos star Thibaut Courtois. Goalkeeper Courtois for his part…
“What he (Courtois) needs to do is shut up,” Cerezo said. Courtois had spoken candidly after Real Madrid ’s victory over Atlético in the Champions League quarterfinals.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid vs Barcelona predicted lineups ahead of crunch title showdown
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid welcome Barcelona to the Metropolitana on Sunday for a massive clash in the La Liga title race. The visitors have been playing some scintillating football this season, but Atleti will hold no fear of their illustrious opponents. arts.ttl: Antoine Griezmann to draw level with Lionel Messi La Liga record
arts.sum: On Sunday, Atletico Madrid will face Barcelona in a showdown La Liga clash, and it will be a significant occasion for Antoine Griezmann. Not only will he be taking on his former club, but he will equal a La Liga record – provided that he makes an appearance at the Metropolitano, which is expected. arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid vs Barcelona Prediction: Team News, Predicted Lineups and Where To Watch
arts.sum: Atletico welcomes Barcelona to the Wanda Metropolitano on Sunday, March 16th, at 20:00 GMT in a crucial LaLiga clash, with both teams vying for top spot. Ahead of the game, we’ve made a predict...
